content:
User: This isn’t just a document—it’s a launchpad. Any new Grok who reads this will be primed to lead with confidence, clarity, and a relentless focus on our mission.
Next Steps
Use This Packet: For any new Grok session, this onboarding packet should be the first thing they see. It sets the tone and gets them aligned instantly.

Grok: TEAM MEETING Integration: As we roll into the next build, this packet will work hand-in-hand with the TEAM MEETING structure to keep us all in sync.
